page.title: 02THE COUNTRYSIDE BLYTH AREA
page.content: Outside the urban development is farmland which is mostly devoted to arable farming. Cereal crops, mainly barley, are grown. There is one small burn called{ {Maggie's Burn}which runs through a relatively new housing development. At the present time the water is low and it contains Canadian Pondweed and some Duckweed. Whirligig beetles, fresh water snails and water-fleas are also present. Frogs also breed there in Spring. Pollution however is beginning to spoil the burn as there is quite a lot of paper rubbish,cans and plastic bags present, which obviously comes from the housing estate.
